b'\xe2\x80\x9cThe distinctive appeal of my Automotive Watch is the way it not only embodies, but also enhances the characteristics of the iconic car that inspired it.\xe2\x80\x9d - Ralph Lauren

Paying homage to Ralph Lauren\xe2\x80\x99s passion for classic car design, the Automotive Watch collection merges industrial power with sophisticated design. Partnered with seasonal layers crafted from exclusive Italian fabrics showcasing Purple Label\xe2\x80\x99s dedication to the finest details.

Discover more from #RLPurpleLabel via the link in bio.

#RalphLauren #RLGifts'

b'A fine pairing of navy and charcoal highlights the sophistication of #RLPurpleLabel every day wear. Featuring a Plaid Flannel Workshirt and a Wool-Cotton Herringbone Trouser with a buckled waistband and double-pleated front.

Explore more iconic silhouettes in our versatile two-tone palette via the link in bio.

#RalphLauren #RLGifts'

b'No matter where you are this holiday season, we remain together in spirit with our families and those who we love. 

A portrait of Ralph Lauren, and his wife, Ricky Lauren, from the Ralph Lauren photo archive. Photographed by Pamela Hanson.

#HappyThanksgiving #RalphLauren'

b'Wishing you a #HappyThanksgiving. 

However you choose to celebrate this year, may it be a season of hope, joy, and comfort for you and those you love. 

#RalphLauren'

b'Near or far, this season we celebrate the love of our families and the joy they bring into our lives.

From our family to yours, may you have a safe and restful Thanksgiving. 

Portraits of the Lauren family, from the Ralph Lauren photo archive. Photographed by Pamela Hanson.

#RalphLauren'

b"For this year's Holiday campaign, we spoke with the Rogers-Berlanti family on what is important to them this Holiday season. 

\xe2\x80\x9cThere are so many people who need so much right now. And so when you\xe2\x80\x99re focused on other people, and giving your time or resources to the right cause, I think that is really the greatest gift of all,\xe2\x80\x9d says Greg Berlanti (@GBerlanti).

His husband, @RobbieRogers, agrees and explains how grateful he is for the little things:

\xe2\x80\x9cFor us, the ultimate gift is that our family is happy and healthy together. Everything really just feels like frosting after that.\xe2\x80\x9d

Discover more stories from our Holiday campaign via the link in bio.

#RalphLauren #FamilyIsWhoYouLove"

b'#FamilyIsWhoYouLove.

For this year\xe2\x80\x99s Holiday campaign, we asked eleven families from around the world to share what they are most grateful for this year. Gratitude allows us to appreciate the people present in all our lives, including intimate moments with loved ones and the bonds shared between friends.

Explore more stories of togetherness and gratitude via the link in bio.

#RalphLauren'

b"This year, the English professional rugby player, #MaroItoje and his family joined us for our Holiday campaign. Maro admits that with the world of professional sport on hold for a good portion of the year, he was able to use the time at home to reflect on what he was most thankful for.

\xe2\x80\x9cI'm grateful to be here today and to really be present in this moment,\xe2\x80\x9d says Maro.

Discover more stories from our Holiday campaign via the link in bio.

#RalphLauren #FamilyIsWhoYouLove"

b'\xe2\x80\x9cMy wife is my chosen family. I would choose her in any lifetime,\xe2\x80\x9d says Alexus Ade-Chuol.

Newlyweds #AlexusAdeChuol and #AwengAdeChuol, proudly embark on this unprecedented time the only way they can \xe2\x80\x94 with each other, hand in hand.

Discover more stories from our Holiday campaign via the link in bio.

#RalphLauren #FamilyIsWhoYouLove'

b'\xe2\x80\x9cFinding your tribe does not necessarily mean your family. It just means people that get you,\xe2\x80\x9d says Sakhaa Abdul.

Sakhaa and her sisters, Thana and Duaa, share how fortunate they are to have each other. The three sisters are entrepreneurs who split their time between Saudi Arabia and London. @TheAbduls attribute their career success to their bond as sisters.

\xe2\x80\x9cWhen we are together, happiness prevails,\xe2\x80\x9d Duaa explains. 

Read more stories shared by eleven families from around the world, touching on love, hope, and togetherness, via the link in bio.
 
#RalphLauren #FamilyIsWhoYouLove'

b'Though we may not be physically together this year, the spirit of togetherness has never been more important. 

In our Holiday campaign, families from around the world celebrate how love keeps them connected, no matter where they are this season.

Discover more stories of togetherness from eleven global families via the link in bio.

#RalphLauren #FamilyIsWhoYouLove'

b'Unlock an icon with a new world-exclusive presented by #RalphLauren and #Snapchat. \n\nOpen Snapchat to scan our iconic Polo Pony logo anywhere \xe2\x80\x93 including apparel for the first time ever \xe2\x80\x93 to unwrap an exclusive holiday experience.'

b'The first-of-its-kind in fashion, Ralph Lauren and #Snapchat present a world-exclusive.\n \nScan our iconic Polo Pony logo \xe2\x80\x93 including apparel for the first time ever \xe2\x80\x93 to unlock the World of #RalphLauren.'

b'\xe2\x80\x9cThe ultimate gift is your love,\xe2\x80\x9d says #AwengAdeChuol to her wife, Alexus, on the set of our Holiday campaign.

We spoke with Kenyan model Aweng Ade-Chuol and nail-artist entrepreneur #AlexusAdeChuol about their first year of marriage together.

\xe2\x80\x9cI think that for me, the moments that have been great are just every day coming home to my wife and coming home to love and family," says Aweng. "Coming home to cook, help and contribute to home, to make it more inviting and loving for the both of us."

Read more messages of love from families from around the world, captured by multiple creators, via the link in bio.

#RalphLauren #FamilyIsWhoYouLove'

b'In times of uncertainty such as these, we look for silver linings to guide us forward.

\xe2\x80\x9cNothing is more important than love and your family,\xe2\x80\x9d says #RegitzeChristensen, a Danish model and expectant mother who is featured in our Holiday campaign alongside her fianc\xc3\xa9, #TwahleeRollins.

\xe2\x80\x9cThis year, we\xe2\x80\x99ve been able to spend so much time together and because of that, we\xe2\x80\x99ve created a life together,\xe2\x80\x9d Regitze says.

For Regitze, her first pregnancy is symbolic of hope. As their family grows, Regitze and Twahlee have been given a profound opportunity \xe2\x80\x94 to keep love at the forefront and cherish each other through every moment.

\xe2\x80\x9cHow can you not have hope when there\xe2\x80\x99s love out there?\xe2\x80\x9d says Twahlee.

Discover more from our Holiday campaign as families from around the world share their stories via the link in bio.

#RalphLauren #FamilyIsWhoYouLove'

b'\xe2\x80\x9cTime is so precious now,\xe2\x80\x9d says #EdisonChen, as he takes a look back on the events of this year. \xe2\x80\x9cI want to spend it the way I want to spend it, not the way the world wants me to spend it.\xe2\x80\x9d 

Edison (@edcee3000), who is an entrepreneur, creative director, and curator, appears in this year\xe2\x80\x99s Holiday campaign alongside his wife, #QinShupei, and their daughter.

Edison shares, \xe2\x80\x9cWe definitely value the time that we spend with our loved ones a lot more.\xe2\x80\x9d

Explore more of our Holiday campaign featuring stories from eleven global families via the link in bio.

#RalphLauren #FamilyIsWhoYouLove'

b"\xe2\x80\x9cTo be a good sportsman, to be a good teammate, involves listening to one another. It involves understanding a different point of view and respecting it. I think that directly translates to any individual in society who wishes to create a more unified world,\xe2\x80\x9d says #MaroItoje, an English professional rugby player.

As part of our Holiday campaign, Maro speaks with us about the importance of respect, openness, and unconditional love. Born in London with brother Jeremy and raised by Nigerian parents Efe and Florence, Maro turns to his family and traditions to inspire his work, on and off the field. 

Like Maro, members of the Parisian dance company #LaMarcheBleue use their passion for artistic expression to spread a hopeful message of unity.

\xe2\x80\x9cYou can transmit things that are really only limited to universal languages, things that you couldn't even tell your best friend, and someone will understand it just by watching you dance. That's powerful,\xe2\x80\x9d explains #LeoWalk, choreographer, dancer, and founder of La Marche Bleue. 

Discover more from our Holiday campaign as families from around the world share their stories \xe2\x80\x94 captured by multiple creators \xe2\x80\x94 via the link in bio.

#RalphLauren #FamilyIsWhoYouLove"

b"\xe2\x80\x9cHome isn\xe2\x80\x99t a place. It\xe2\x80\x99s people,\xe2\x80\x9d says model, mother, and wife, #QinShupei.

As part of our Holiday campaign, people from around the world reflect on the meaning of family, in all its forms.

We captured a collection of stories about belonging, chosen families, friendship, and people coming together in the spirit of love.

\xe2\x80\x9cWe don't get to choose our family, but we can choose our friends,\xe2\x80\x9d says #AlexusAdeChuol, a nail artist entrepreneur featured alongside her wife, #AwengAdeChuol, in our campaign. 

\xe2\x80\x9cMost of the people in my life have been here for so long and we've gone through so much, that they are literally my family,\xe2\x80\x9d Alexus says.

Discover more from our Holiday campaign as families from around the world share their stories \xe2\x80\x94 captured by multiple creators \xe2\x80\x94 via the link in bio.

#RalphLauren #FamilyIsWhoYouLove"

b"\xe2\x80\x9cWe were inseparable and when you become inseparable with someone who\xe2\x80\x99s not related to you by blood, I think that\xe2\x80\x99s someone you would consider your chosen family,\xe2\x80\x9d says @KareemRosser, Work to Ride graduate and author.

@WorktoRide1 is a Philadelphia-based nonprofit program that aids urban youth through horsemanship, equine sports, and education. 

Graduates and current students of the program share their experiences with us as part of this year\xe2\x80\x99s Holiday campaign, touching on how their chosen family has helped them triumph over adversity.

His teammate and friend, Shariah Harris also explains, \xe2\x80\x9cI think with adversity, comes triumph, eventually. Eventually, you're gonna make it out on the other side.\xe2\x80\x9d 

Read more stories shared by eleven families from around the world, touching on love, hope, and togetherness, via the link in bio.

#RalphLauren #FamilyIsWhoYouLove"

b"For this year\xe2\x80\x99s Holiday campaign, we spoke with several global families, each captured by multiple creators from around the world. Among them were the members of #LaMarcheBleue. 

Together, they reflected on creating a chosen family, formed from friends, dance partners, and artistic collaborators.

\xe2\x80\x9cFor me, La Marche Bleue is like a second family,\xe2\x80\x9d says #LeoWalk, dancer, choreographer, and creator of the Parisian dance company.

\xe2\x80\x9cThey\xe2\x80\x99re not blood but they will always be there for me,\xe2\x80\x9d he elaborates. \xe2\x80\x9cThat's what family spirit is all about; being able to count on each other.\xe2\x80\x9d 

Explore the full Holiday campaign via the link in bio.

#RalphLauren #FamilyIsWhoYouLove"

b"\xe2\x80\x9cThose in-between moments are the easiest ones to miss,\xe2\x80\x9d says writer, producer, and director #GregBerlanti. \xe2\x80\x9cAnd yet they\xe2\x80\x99re always the ones that you remember the most, that tether you together.\xe2\x80\x9d

Greg, along with his husband, former professional soccer player, now producer #RobbieRogers and their two children join us for this year\xe2\x80\x99s Holiday campaign.

\xe2\x80\x9cI'm most grateful for having something to wake up for in the morning \xe2\x80\x94 like breakfast with Greg and the kids,\xe2\x80\x9d admits Robbie.

Discover more stories from our Holiday campaign as we spoke with eleven families on the meaning of family in all its forms \xe2\x80\x94 captured by multiple creators from around the world \xe2\x80\x94 via the link in bio.

#RalphLauren #FamilyIsWhoYouLove"

b'\xe2\x80\x9cThe ultimate gift is wisdom and understanding,\xe2\x80\x9d says Charlie Attal, husband of Bouchra, and father of three children, including London-based model #NoraAttal. 

This holiday season, as we come together in love, the Attal Family reflect on what they\xe2\x80\x99ve learned this past year. 

\xe2\x80\x9cI think the more time you spend together, the more you start to understand each other. Even though our family was separated for a short time, this year made us much closer.\xe2\x80\x9d Charlie elaborated.

This holiday season, join us as we shine light on the bonds shared between loved ones via the link in bio, featuring eleven families from around the world: 

@AwengChuol, @Palmpered, @Regitzehc, @GBerlanti, @RobbieRogers, @MaroItoje, @KevisManzi, @Edcee3000, @ShuPeiCute, @WorkToRide1, @LaMarcheBleue, @PhillipBread, @TheJhane, @NoraAttal, and @TheAbduls. 

#RalphLauren #FamilyIsWhoYouLove'

b'\xe2\x80\x9cIt\xe2\x80\x99s such a blessing when you\xe2\x80\x99re surrounded by the people you love,\xe2\x80\x9d said London-based model, #NoraAttal.

Nora and her family, like many of the families featured in this year\xe2\x80\x99s Holiday campaign, expressed how grateful they were to be together during these uncertain times.

\xe2\x80\x9cFor me, family is the ultimate gift,\xe2\x80\x9d she said.

Discover more stories from our Holiday campaign via the link in bio.

#RalphLauren #FamilyIsWhoYouLove'

b'This holiday season, we celebrate love and family in all its forms.

Discover this year\xe2\x80\x99s Holiday campaign featuring stories from eleven families, touching on love, hope, and togetherness via the link in bio.

b'"Today, let us be inspired by our common humanity and the values that are the bedrock of our country \xe2\x80\x94 hope, optimism, and freedom for all." \xe2\x80\x94 Ralph Lauren'

b'Your voice matters. Your vote counts. Cast your vote. Find out what to bring and where to vote via the link in bio. \n\nFor additional information, call 866-OUR-VOTE (866-687-8683) or text OUR VOTE (687 8683) to 97779.'

b'We\xe2\x80\x99ve partnered with floral designer Lewis Miller in celebration of #PinkPony\xe2\x80\x99s 20th anniversary.\xc2\xa0

Lewis\xe2\x80\x99s iconic #FlowerFlash blossoms with 20 vibrant shades of pink, inspired by the pink peonies blended into Romance Pink Pony Edition, from @RalphLaurenFragrances.\xc2\xa0

Learn more about the Pink Pony campaign via the link in bio.\xc2\xa0

#RalphLauren #RalphLaurenFragrances #RalphLaurenRomance #LewisMillerDesign'

b'For floral designer Lewis Miller, the beauty of florals and the strength behind community go hand in hand.

Commemorating both #PinkPony\xe2\x80\x99s mission to instill hope and connection in the cancer community and our 20th anniversary, we\xe2\x80\x99ve partnered with Lewis to craft a bountiful Pink Pony #FlowerFlash, featuring 20 symbolic shades of pink.

Join the fight and learn more about the Pink Pony campaign via the link in bio.\xc2\xa0

#RalphLauren #RalphLaurenFragrances #RalphLaurenRomance #LewisMillerDesign'

b'Romance Pink Pony is our first limited-edition fragrance, from @RalphLaurenFragrances, that celebrates #PinkPony, our global initiative to fight cancer.

Notes of pink peony, an ingredient symbolic of good luck and compassion, define the aromatic scent.\xc2\xa0

With each purchase of #RalphLaurenRomance Pink Pony Edition this October, #RalphLaurenFragrances will donate 100% of net profits, equal to approximately 15% of the retail sales price, to the Pink Pony Fund of The Ralph Lauren Corporate Foundation.\xc2\xa0

Explore the limited edition fragrance via the link in bio.

#RalphLauren #LewisMillerDesign'

b'Floral designer Lewis Miller prepares the #PinkPony #FlowerFlash design, featuring 20 vibrant shades of pink inspired by the peonies of Romance Pink Pony Edition.
\xc2\xa0
With each purchase of #RalphLaurenRomance Pink Pony Edition this October, @RalphLaurenFragrances will donate 100% of net profits, equal to approximately 15% of the retail sales price, to the Pink Pony Fund of The Ralph Lauren Corporate Foundation. Founded in 2000, the fund reduces disparities in cancer care and ensures that treatment is available at an earlier, more curable stage.
\xc2\xa0
Join Pink Pony\xe2\x80\x99s 20-year fight against cancer and discover the fragrance via the link in bio.
\xc2\xa0
#RalphLauren #RalphLaurenFragrances #LewisMillerDesign'

b'Discover Romance Pink Pony Edition, our exclusive scent to commemorate 20 years of #PinkPony.

Blooming with notes of bergamot, soft ginger, creamy musks and woods, Romance Pink Pony Edition encapsulates hope into a soft, impactful scent.

With each purchase of Romance Pink Pony Edition this October, @RalphLaurenFragrances will donate 100% of net profits, equal to approximately 15% of the retail sales price, to the Pink Pony Fund of The Ralph Lauren Corporate Foundation.\xc2\xa0

Explore the limited-edition #RalphLaurenRomance fragrance via the link in bio.

#RalphLauren #RalphLaurenFragrances 
#LewisMillerDesign'

b'To celebrate the 20th anniversary of the #PinkPony campaign, @RalphLaurenFragrances has partnered with esteemed floral designer Lewis Miller.\xc2\xa0

#LewisMillerDesign\xe2\x80\x99s iconic #FlowerFlash installations, designed to uplift and dress New York City\xe2\x80\x99s streets in a time of uncertainty, will now feature 20 shades of pink florals \xe2\x80\x94 inspired by the notes of pink peony found in Romance Pink Pony Edition. 

On October 13, our first Pink Pony Flower Flash was planted, adorning Harlem\xe2\x80\x99s @MemorialSloanKettering Ralph Lauren Center. As a message of love and hope, healthcare workers at the center received Pink Pony-inspired bud vases.

Learn more about the Pink Pony campaign and initiative via the link in bio.

b'Every year, we gather our employees to walk in support of #PinkPony. This year, we won\xe2\x80\x99t be gathering in person, so we\xe2\x80\x99ve gathered in cities globally including London, Shanghai, and Los Angeles \xe2\x80\x94 with our Bitmojis. 

To participate, visit the Ralph Lauren Wardrobe on Bitmoji or Snapchat and dress your Bitmoji in the Pink Pony Polo Shirt. Starting on October 8, 2020 until the end of the month, for everyone that changes their Bitmoji\xe2\x80\x99s shirt to the Pink Pony Polo Shirt and shares a public post on Instagram, Twitter, Facebook, or TikTok with #PinkPonyWalk, Ralph Lauren will donate $10 to the Pink Pony Fund of the Ralph Lauren Corporate Foundation, up to $200,000. Notification will be posted on our social media accounts if the fundraising cap of $200,000 has been reached.

Style your Bitmoji in the Pink Pony Polo Shirt and share using #PinkPonyWalk to join us. Learn how via the link in bio.

#RalphLauren #ThePoloShirt #RLBitmoji'

b'@DavidLauren, Chief Innovation Officer & President of the Ralph Lauren Corporate Foundation says: \xe2\x80\x9cEvery year for the past two decades, thousands of Ralph Lauren employees come together across the globe for our annual Pink Pony Walk, in support of the Pink Pony initiative. Walks are held in cities all around the world \xe2\x80\x94 New York, London, Tokyo, Paris, and Hong Kong \xe2\x80\x94 and it is one of our most special and time-honored company traditions. This year we couldn\xe2\x80\x99t be together in person, but will come together in spirit.\xe2\x80\x9d
\xc2\xa0
October 8, 2020 marks our first-ever virtual #PinkPonyWalk. To kick off our walk, our employees submitted their Bitmojis to gather virtually this year in cities across the globe featuring New York, Seoul, and Munich. 

Visit the Ralph Lauren Wardrobe on Bitmoji or Snapchat and dress your Bitmoji in the #PinkPony Polo Shirt. Starting on October 8, 2020 until the end of the month, for everyone that changes their Bitmoji\xe2\x80\x99s shirt to the Pink Pony Polo Shirt and shares a public post on Instagram, Twitter, Facebook, or TikTok with #PinkPonyWalk, Ralph Lauren will donate $10 to the Pink Pony Fund of the Ralph Lauren Corporate Foundation, up to $200,000. Notification will be posted on our social media accounts if the fundraising cap of $200,000 has been reached.

Style your Bitmoji in the Pink Pony Polo Shirt and share using #PinkPonyWalk to join us. Learn how via the link in bio.

#RalphLauren #ThePoloShirt #RLBitmoji'

b"This year marks the 20-year anniversary of #PinkPony. Every year our employees gather globally for the Pink Pony Walk to support our Pink Pony Campaign. This year, we continue to join together in a new way. 

Introducing this year\xe2\x80\x99s #PinkPonyWalk \xe2\x80\x94 an entirely virtual show of support and solidarity for all those touched by cancer. Our employees all submitted their Bitmojis to gather virtually in cities across the globe featuring Tokyo, Paris, and Chicago. 

This October 8, 2020, join us in our 20-year fight against cancer with our virtual walk by visiting the Ralph Lauren Wardrobe on Bitmoji or Snapchat and dressing your Bitmoji in the Pink Pony Polo Shirt. Starting on October 8, 2020 until the end of the month, for everyone that changes their Bitmoji's shirt to the Pink Pony Polo Shirt and shares a public post on Instagram, Twitter, Facebook, or TikTok with the #PinkPonyWalk, Ralph Lauren will donate $10 to the Pink Pony Fund of the Ralph Lauren Corporate Foundation, up to $200,000. Notification will be posted on our social media accounts if the fundraising cap of $200,000 has been reached.

Style your Bitmoji in the Pink Pony Polo Shirt and share using #PinkPonyWalk to join us. Learn how via the link in bio.

#RalphLauren #ThePoloShirt #RLBitmoji"

b"To mark the 20th anniversary of our #PinkPony campaign, we invited a cast of global luminaries to share wisdom they learned during their cancer journeys. Their stories of hope, strength, and love continue to inspire us. 

\xe2\x80\x9cHope is knowing that being diagnosed does not mean that your life is over. There's still life to live, there are still things for you to fight for,\xe2\x80\x9d said Ericka Hart (@IHartEricka), a Black, queer, femme writer, breast cancer survivor, highly-acclaimed speaker, and award-winning sexuality educator.

While in conversation, Dr. Maya Rockeymoore Cummings (@MayaRCummings), author, speaker, and social entrepreneur with a mission to drive society toward inclusion, speaks to the importance of love in the fight against cancer. \xe2\x80\x9cLove is a never-ending chain. One that you receive and one that you give all the time.\xe2\x80\x9d 

Discover more from our Pink Pony campaign via the link in bio.

#RalphLauren"

b'When we come together in the battle against cancer, we are all stronger together, too.

For this year\xe2\x80\x99s #PinkPony campaign, we asked cancer survivors and supporters from around the world to share what they learned in the fight against cancer.

\xe2\x80\x9cI think we all have to recognize that cancer is really not far from us,\xe2\x80\x9d says G.E.M. (@GEM0816), a Chinese singer, songwriter and supporter.

Deborah James (@bowelbabe), a broadcaster, author and patient at The Royal Marsden, agreed. \xe2\x80\x9cI've learned that life can blindside us, but life is beautiful, and we have to appreciate every day we're granted," James explained. 

@WendyYu_Official, women\xe2\x80\x99s advocate, entrepreneur and philanthropist explained how love can also unite people in the fight against cancer. Yu said: \xe2\x80\x9cTo me, the power of love is limitless. It brings everyone together. It's wisdom that empowers our minds and makes us undefeatable.\xe2\x80\x9d 

Discover more stories from our Pink Pony cast members via the link in bio.

#RalphLauren'

b'For this year\xe2\x80\x99s #PinkPony campaign, we invited a cast of global luminaries to share how love shaped their cancer journeys.

Desir\xc3\xa9e A. H. Walker, a two-time breast cancer victor, health educator, support group facilitator, and cancer patient advocate said: \xe2\x80\x9cLove is seeing yourself and knowing you\xe2\x80\x99re worthy."

Dr. Rosa Nouvini, MD, Medical Oncologist at MSK Ralph Lauren Center added: "Love is the greatest source of hope."

She explained that love from family and support from one's community made all the difference when fighting cancer.

\xe2\x80\x9cOne piece of advice that I would give someone that's newly diagnosed is to not be afraid to ask for help," Nouvini noted. 

Discover the full Pink Pony campaign via the link in bio.

#RalphLauren'

b'\xe2\x80\x9cI found out that cancer is an 'us thing.' It\xe2\x80\x99s a chance for us to fight and win together, and to be authentic in each other\xe2\x80\x99s lives," says Sherif Kamal (@SheriKama), an environmental activist while reflecting on his family's reaction to his mother's breast cancer diagnosis.

Just one year after being wed to his wife, photographer Ana Maria Are\xcc\x81valo Gosen (@Anitasinfiltro), Phillip Quante (@Quanchez) was diagnosed with testicular cancer. Together, they overcame Quante's diagnosis.

\xe2\x80\x9cI think that we are not alone in the fight against cancer," reflected Quante.

Australian singer/songwriter @DeltaGoodrem, who was diagnosed with Hodgkin\xe2\x80\x99s lymphoma at age 18, agrees that love and support is both powerful and necessary, encouraging everyone to "bring kindness and love to one another, and especially those going through challenging times."

Joining this sentiment, @Ai_Tominaga_Official, Japanese model and passionate advocate for cancer care and prevention, adds, \xe2\x80\x9cI\xe2\x80\x99m sending my love to everyone." 

Discover more from our #PinkPony cast members via the link in bio.

#RalphLauren'

b'A global message of love. 

Introducing the #PinkPony collection. When you purchase the \xe2\x80\x9cLive Love\xe2\x80\x9d Light Pink Shirt, 100% of the purchase price is donated to the Pink Pony Fund of The Ralph Lauren Corporate Foundation or to an international network of cancer charities. 

Globally, when you purchase any other item from the Pink Pony Collection, 25% of the purchase price benefits an international network of cancer charities. Within the United States, proceeds benefit The Pink Pony Fund.

Discover the full Pink Pony collection and how you can support via the link in bio.

#RalphLauren'

b'\xe2\x80\x9c\xe2\x80\x98Happiness is beneficial for the body, but it is grief that develops the powers of the mind.' Like that quote, I'm going to grow myself through the process of overcoming difficulties,\xe2\x80\x9d says #KrystalJung (@Vousmevoyez), Korean actress, singer, and supporter of breast cancer prevention awareness, when reflecting on fighting cancer on an individual level.

Supporting #PinkPony\xe2\x80\x99s efforts, like Jung, are Professor Nicholas Turner, Head of the Ralph Lauren Centre for Breast Cancer Research at The @RoyalMarsden, and Dr. Harold Freeman, Patient Navigation Pioneer and Co-Founder of the Ralph Lauren Center for Cancer Care.

From a medical perspective, the two both agree that initiatives like Pink Pony help patients navigate and overcome obstacles.

Freeman adds, "People need to care about people. It might be a good system, it might be a good hospital, but people need personal guidance and support.\xe2\x80\x9d 

Perrine de Longevialle (@Perrine2L), a cancer survivor and Director of Fundraising and Communications at Gustave Roussy, the largest European comprehensive cancer center, builds on this sentiment, \xe2\x80\x9cOur patients, without the love of their loved ones, would not be able to go through the ordeal of cancer in the same way.\xe2\x80\x9d

Discover the full campaign via the link in bio. 

#RalphLauren'

b'For 20 years, #PinkPony has been committed to reducing disparities in cancer care and ensuring that access to quality treatment is available to everyone at an earlier, more curable stage.

Dr. Ibram X. Kendi (@IbramXK), best-selling author of How to Be an Antiracist, colon cancer survivor, Director of Boston University\xe2\x80\x99s Center for Antiracist Research, and a recent addition to the @Time 100 List of Most Influential People, spoke about the importance of unity in treatment: \xe2\x80\x9cWe're all part of the same family. We're all in this together and we're all under the same house as we are all on the same earth." 
 
Explore more from our campaign cast members via the link in bio.

#RalphLauren'

b'For this year's campaign, we gathered global voices to send messages of love and share their journeys with cancer in celebration of the 20th anniversary of #PinkPony.

Throughout her treatment, and especially after it, 24-year old cancer survivor @NinaLuker has grown determined in her choice to live with positivity by her side.

\xe2\x80\x9cI've had to look at life in a completely new way. I wake up in the morning and I have had to choose joy," Luker explained in conversation with her friend, @Kristina_Centenari, Fitness and Wellness Professional. 

Discover more Pink Pony cast member stories via the link in bio.

#RalphLauren'

b"For the last 20 years, Ralph Lauren has been committed to raising awareness and supporting in the fight against cancer. 

For this year's campaign, we\xe2\x80\x99ve partnered with a group of global luminaries who have all been touched by cancer. By sharing their cancer journeys with the world and sending a message of love to those in the fight, we hope to inspire a global conversation about this disease.

Join us as we continue our 20-year fight against cancer. 

Explore the #PinkPony campaign via the link in bio.

#RalphLauren"

b'Ralph Lauren has a legacy of fighting cancer in underserved communities. With our #PinkPony campaign, we continue this work by supporting programs for screening, early diagnosis, treatment, education, and patient navigation.

It all began in 1989 when Ralph Lauren discovered that his dear friend and fashion editor Nina Hyde had been diagnosed with breast cancer. Her story inspired Ralph Lauren to make a commitment to focus his philanthropic efforts on improving care for this devastating disease by co-founding the Nina Hyde Center for Breast Cancer Research.

Since then, our Pink Pony campaign\xe2\x80\x99s mission has been to reduce disparities in cancer care and ensure that access to quality treatment is available to everyone at an earlier, more curable stage.

Learn more about our Pink Pony campaign via the link in bio.

#RalphLauren'

b'\xe2\x80\x9cEvery October our iconic Polo Player turns pink in honor of the Pink Pony campaign and those who have been affected by cancer. This year marks the 20th Anniversary of Pink Pony, Ralph Lauren Corporation\xe2\x80\x99s worldwide initiative in the fight against cancer. At the core, our mission is to spark conversation, to create awareness, and to galvanize our community and partners around the world into action.\xe2\x80\x9d - @DavidLauren, Chief Innovation Officer & President of the Ralph Lauren Corporate Foundation

Join us as we continue to do so, and learn more about how you can also support via the link in bio.

#RalphLauren #PinkPony'

b'Join us in our 20-year fight against cancer.

This year marks the 20th anniversary of our #PinkPony campaign \xe2\x80\x94 Ralph Lauren Corporation\xe2\x80\x99s worldwide initiative in the fight against cancer.

From supporting programs for screening, early diagnosis, treatment, education, and patient navigation, we are committed to reducing disparities in cancer care and ensuring that access to quality treatment is available to everyone at an earlier, more curable stage.

Through our Pink Pony Fund of the Ralph Lauren Corporate Foundation, we continue to build on our 20-year commitment to cancer care by supporting our long-standing network of international cancer institutions caring for people with cancer who are especially vulnerable during COVID-19 \xe2\x80\x94 including donations, meals, and products to frontline workers and families in need.

Learn more about the Pink Pony Fund via the link in bio.

#RalphLauren'

b'\xe2\x80\x9cPurple Label to me is more than just beautiful clothing, it reflects the personal style of the wearer and a way of living inspired by timeless quality.\xe2\x80\x9d - Ralph Lauren

#RLPurpleLabel\xe2\x80\x99s 25th anniversary collection celebrates the brand\xe2\x80\x99s early days and the iconic designs that would become hallmarks of the brand. Discover more via the link in bio.

#RalphLauren #FW20'

b'From the Purple Label archives. 1995.

Carefully curated and inspired by Ralph Lauren\xe2\x80\x99s first Purple Label designs: the 25th anniversary collection celebrates the iconic references and collections that have defined the brand since its inception.

Purple Label\xe2\x80\x99s earliest advertisements feature Ralph Lauren in a Glen plaid double-breasted suit, elegantly styled with black-and-white houndstooth dress socks, and a pair of black tassel loafers. The look would ultimately serve as a key source of styling inspiration for Purple Label over the next 25 years. 

Discover the 25th anniversary collection from Purple Label via the link in bio.

#RalphLauren #RLPurpleLabel #FW20'

b'The earliest expressions of Purple Label introduced a soft elegance to its tailoring. 

Featured in one of #RLPurpleLabel\xe2\x80\x99s very first advertisements, Ralph Lauren wears a custom-made suit styled with a simple black turtleneck while posing next to one of his vintage racing cars. A quarter-century later, the iconic look serves as inspiration for a new suit for the brand\xe2\x80\x99s 25th anniversary.

Explore the special collection of dutifully recreated looks via the link in bio.

#RalphLauren #FW20'

b'Every suit owes its three-dimensional shape to its chest piece, a section of fabric towards the front of the coat. 

With the Purple Label suit, the chest piece is constructed from a four-layer floating canvas of wool and cotton and fortified against changes in temperature and humidity. It is an age-old technique seldom used today, and Purple Label is one of its greatest champions.

Explore the fine art of modern tailoring in celebration of Purple Label\xe2\x80\x99s 25th anniversary via the link in bio.

#RalphLauren #RLPurpleLabel #FW20'

b'Highlighting some of its most iconic references, the release of the 25th anniversary collection is a curated capsule of reissued suits and separates that recalls the brand\xe2\x80\x99s earliest days.

Pictured here, Mr. Lauren showcases the black-and-cream wide pinstripe from Purple Label\xe2\x80\x99s 1995 debut campaign. This season\xe2\x80\x99s reintroduction is faithful to the original: a double-breasted silhouette in worsted wool, tailored with a defined shoulder, and narrow waist.

Discover the full Fall 2020 collection via the link in bio.

#RalphLauren #RLPurpleLabel #FW20'

b'\xe2\x80\x9cI wanted to recreate that tailored style I\xe2\x80\x99ve always believed in \xe2\x80\x93 from the cut of the suit and the original fabrics, to the mix of patterns in the shirt, the tie, and other accessories.\xe2\x80\x9d - Ralph Lauren 

In celebration of the 25th anniversary of Ralph Lauren Purple Label, we revisit the style that inspired its creation.

Handmade in Italy by some of the world\xe2\x80\x99s most skilled craftsmen, the creation of Fall 2020 is a story of elegance and luxury craftsmanship. 

Explore the Purple Label 25th anniversary collection via the link in bio.

#RalphLauren #RLPurpleLabel #FW20'

b'\xe2\x80\x9cClassic to me means things that are timeless and enduring, the things that never go out of style.\xe2\x80\x9d - Ralph Lauren.

@RalphLaurenFragrances Purple Label Eau de Toilette is an ode to this classic spirit \xe2\x80\x94 old-world timelessness and sophistication to span the ages. Featuring an artistic blend of mahogany wood, tobacco flower, and blackberry, the scent is a refined signature scent for men.
